title: How to write about me - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all, congratulation that you have thought about writing about yourself. And, sorry for a late answer. To start with, when you write something, you need be very clear about who is going to read it. If you are willing to keep it a secret and trying to do an introspection or just writing to find the answer of ‘who am I?’ then your content will be different from a general information which will be available for public reading. After you are sure about your targeted readers, you can follow the below steps to go with your writing. Be at a calm and quite place where you can think uninterruptedly.Note down broadly what are the things you want to share with your readerDivide the broad topics in paragraphs/ chaptersOne by one put your thoughts into each chapter/ paragraphRevisit what you have written and edit for consistency of your thought, grammatical mistake if anyAlso, assess the impact of your information on your reader, whether you truly want the reader to read it or not.In normal cases you may need to modify/ correct what you have written 3/4 times before you go for finalisation. I know few good authors who corrects his writing up to 6 times. So, best of luck!!

Write about yourself can be difficult , So for that you have to first ask yourself some question like what you are, what type of personality(angry,cool etc) you have, what is the uniqueness that you think . These question will help you to write about yourself . But now question can be arise that how will you get the answer of these question. Don’t worry , follow this following point that i give you below: Sit in a silent place for think about your current and past activity that will give you the answer of what you are.Collect all your achievement throughout the life that will help you to know your talent .May be it will be a biggest point about you.Recognise your daily basis activity that you follow , will help you to know your interest.For knowing your personality . You have to ask some question to your colleagues, parents etc about your behaviour because that is the thing you will not get by yourself .Finally, when you write keep focus on these point . And try to don’t write something about future. I hope you get your answer …..BEST OF LUCK!!!!!

Hi,on a page, do a SWOT analysis. That's Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats. This will give you an accurate understanding of yourself in words. Make notes about interesting anecdotes or important events (which you wish to share). Maybe a lead-up or background for that incident or maybe the after-effects (lol) or maybe both. That'll provide your readers with a more well-rounded understanding. If you're not sure about what pattern to follow, I'll humbly suggest doing so chronologically. You can check about the formatting options online. It's important that your content, i.e. - narrative, is engaging. All the Best. :)

I feel that's the easiest thing to write about and the toughest at the same time! Easiest because if there is someone you know in and out that is you yourself and toughest because when you write about yourself you reveal a lot about your life and it is not easy to put it all down on paper, it takes courage. If you want to write about yourself then ask yourself why you have not written about yourself yet and begin! It is the best way to vent out, it will escalate your patience level.
